mainText:
You have made a huge impact on the world of technology and you will  
never be forgotten. My deepest sympathy and prayers to the Jobs  
Family. As I write this on my Macbook I am greatly appreciative to the  
wonderful mind of Steve Jobs.

Thanks for making an impact on my life and the lives of many others  
with the technology you have introduced to us over the years.

A loyal Apple Fan, and owner of many Apple products and many more in  
the future.
author: David
